name: Underkeeper [Alpha Release]
description:
The Darkness looms before you, a never-ending maw of adventure and mystery.  The ground trembles as leviathans shift around beneath your feet and the air around you fills with scents of brimstone.

Welcome to Underkeeper!  A platforming adventure game following seven heroes delving into the bowels of the darkness below.

This game is released as an early access alpha: certain functionality is not available at the moment of launch.

This alpha version presents the player with the first character option: the Ardent, and the first Underkeep dungeon room to be explored.  More content, including class-oriented powers, collectible nodes, new maps and environments, more sounds and visual effects, new character classes and more will be released as the game development cycle continues!

Underkeeper is made by Andrew Welsh and Isaac H. Jones as a part of Webster University's Introduction to Video Game Development course.
